basics.name: Igor Mirćić
basics.label: Front-End Web Developer
basics.summary: Throughout my 5-year-plus career as a software / hardware engineer, I have learned a lot of different technologies. At my last job, I worked on industrial SCADA systems (front-end apps for controlling industrial machines). One of the clients required remote control of systems. For this project, I built an app that runs in a web browser. Seeing how there is a lot of demand for web apps, this has sparked my interest in web development. I spent last year learning on my own and also did three months internship with mentor at Ingsoftware. Below you'll find projects I've completed that showcase my skills as a front-end developer.

education.institution: Faculty of Electronic Engineering - University of Nis

projects.name: Where in world?
projects.description: Created responsive, accessible, and mobile-first web application that displays information about countries. Utilized REST Counties API for countries data, React and Material UI for building user interface.

projects.name: Birra-33
projects.description: Created shop for selling beer. Utilized PUNK API for data, Handlebars, JQuery and SCSS for building user interface.

projects.name: Graxpo
